name: UAZ Racing 4x4
summary: UAZ is not just another model amongst other all-terrain vehicles – it‘s a real legend of the Russian motor industry. These unique cars can go places where no man has ever even heard of the word “road”! The first Russian SUV driving simulator “UAZ RACING 4x4” is dedicated solely to this car, UAZ. Now you can show off your outstanding off-roader in the most severe durability tests and ride the really impassable roads, one of the most remarkable and famous Russian phenomena since ancient times.

name: Uayeb: The Dry Land - Episode 1
summary: You as Uayeb, will explore and survive in a hostile environment, you will find clues helped by your friend archeologist Joanna, to discover Mayan artifacts that will lead you to the lost civilization, you will craft your equipment to be ready for the adventure.

name: Uayeb
summary: Uayeb is a solo story driven adventure / survival / puzzle game, on the path of the Mayan civilization, placed in an open world with the immersive First Person view.

name: Uazo: Free as a Bird
summary: Soar as a curious bird on a mysterious island filled with secrets, ancient ruins, and hidden wonders. Explore with your friends, gather resources, build, survive and uncover the island’s story in this serene adventure.

name: UAV Wars
summary: UAV Wars is a 3D arcade action game where you remotely pilot a UAV to take down rival drones and secure a defense contract. Developed independently with Microsoft’s XNA toolset, it launched on Xbox 360 in 2008.

name: Uagi-Saba
summary: Raise, care for and breed magical creatures called Mystics all with their own unique genes. Carve out your own underground sanctuary and discover it's secrets.

name: UAC Invasion: The Supply Depot
summary: The map is about a marine who must infiltrate a UAC Corporation large base because there are indications that dangerous secret experiments related to portals and Satanism are taking place. The protagonist is hidden in a truck of the UAC that goes to the complex getting to enter without major problems. But once inside the facilities he realizes that something terrible has happened there, it seems that he is not the only unexpected visitor...

name: UAV Operator
summary: Try on the role of an elite UAV operator: control combat drones, carry out important missions, and feel the weight of responsibility. Realistic locations, modern technology, strategic operations and career growth.

name: UAL: Universal AIM League
summary: UAL is a FPS game. You can engage in either 1V1, play with or against a friend, or 2V2 duel. UAL relies on e-sport mechanics with Best of 5 Set system (1 Set is a best of 3 games) and mini game for each round.

name: UAC Storage Surplus Project
summary: The year is 2123. The UAC accidentally added 20 zeroes to its order of 1 crate. You are hired to vanquish the menace of the ludicrous amount of crates. Go, little Cratemaster, the Containment Area needs you!

name: Uanamon: Rugly Invasion
summary: In the basement during the shelling, Sofia creates a character named Dracolyk who protects the imaginary World of Uanamon’s from the monsters country of rugly. As more children from different parts of Ukraine draw their own characters, the confrontation against the enemies grows stronger.

name: UAC Ultra
summary: UAC Ultra is a WAD originally released on March 28, 2010 by Jamie Bainbridge (Super Jamie) and Jon Vail (40oz) which requires a Boom-compatible source port. It makes exclusive use of a set of custom textures created by Vail, and features two new monsters. It consists of 11 levels, and an inescapable "credits" level which prevents the player from progressing into the standard Doom II level set.

name: U.A.S
summary: A psychedelic first person shooter heavily inspired by Cruelty Squad, made as a submission to LSDJam 2023 and serves as a spiritual sequel to Portland: 2024.
